desc: We are a luxury, vintage inspired skincare brand. Our Skin Tonics, Vanishing Creams and Cold Creams are based on recipes from the 1920's, 30's and 40's. All of our products are hand made in small batches using natural, skin pampering ingredients. Bring some glamour back to your everyday skincare!

layout.text: Bring Glamour Back To Your Skincare

Welcome to The Lovely Rose Apothecary! We are a luxury, vintage-inspired skincare brand. Our Skin Tonics, Vanishing Creams and Cold Creams are based on recipes from the 1920s, 30s and 40s. All of our products are hand-made in small batches using natural, skin-pampering ingredients. Bring some glamour back to your everyday skincare!
